de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.io.manager

Interface IFileManager<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IEventManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AFileManager, ConfigurationManager, FeatureModelManager, VirtualFileManager

    public interface IFileManager<T>
extends IEventManager
    Responsible to load and save all information for a feature model instance.
    Author:
    Sebastian Krieter

      • getAbsolutePath

        java.lang.String getAbsolutePath()

      • getPath

        java.nio.file.Path getPath()

      • getLastProblems

        ProblemList getLastProblems()
        Returns:
        A list of problems occurred during last read or write operation.

      • read

        boolean read()
        Loads the content from the local file and stores it in the local object. To update the persistent and variable object, override() must be called.
        Returns:
        true if successful read, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        override()

      • save

        boolean save()
        Save last modifications to the local file. Updates (overrides) local object and persistent object.
        Returns:
        true if successful write, false otherwise.

      • externalSave

        boolean externalSave(java.lang.Runnable externalSaveMethod)

      • override

        void override()
        Overrides the variable and persistent object with the local object.

        Returns:
